alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 4:10AM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall has occurred over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 58.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday evening and continue rising to a crest of 73.4 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
